basic.description: This course is an introduction to modern Hebrew prose (fiction and non-fiction) as well as the continued development of speaking, listening, writing, and grammatical skills. May not be taken by native speakers. May not be taken concurrently with HBR 1120 and/or 1121. Completion of this course fulfills the foreign language requirement for the College of Arts and Sciences.
basic.subject: HBR
basic.title: Intermediate Modern Hebrew

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: HBR 1120 and HBR 1121 or equivalent.
